channel.title: Linux on Sarthak Pranesh
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Sarthak Pranesh

item.title: Introduction to Linux Part 2 — Time To Draw Swords
item.description: Learn about linux and how to use linux shell to your advantage. Learn about what are packages and package managers. We will also go through some of the commands that will help us manage packages (software) in your Linux system and some other commands that will help you use your system more efficiently

item.title: Introduction to Linux Part 1 — First Blood
item.description: Learn about linux and how to use linux shell to your advantage. This is for beginners out there who have recently started to have a taste of Linux and want to know more terminal commands and how to use these commands to benefit them in their daily needs, and want to expand there knowledge about Linux further
